li.p:
(a)
GSA will, upon request, provide technical and acquisition assistance, or will delegate its contracting authority for the furnishing of the services described in this part for any Federal agency, mixed-ownership Government corporation, the District of Columbia, the Senate, the House of Representatives, or the Architect of the Capitol and any activity under the Architectâ€™s direction.

(b)
Agencies, seeking assistance shall provide upon request by GSA the information listed in 41.301.
